title: I think I just got a bad omen of next season

replies.body: *Hugs Nami to make her feel better*
https://i.gyazo.com/thumb/200/_9fe9f037adf068b82f80d5bbc4e4b8b4.png
back to the depths with you{{champion:41}}
Something something sign of a broken man.
Silver ain't so bad! Better than Bronze
I got out of bronze, but silver is just impossible to escape. o_o
silver has more bad players than bronze. bronze just doesn't care.

> [{quoted}](name=Jelly Mac,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=vkNNFx4q,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-12-21T07:10:00.714+0000)
>
> Silver ain't so bad! Better than Bronze

thats right! BE PROUD OF YOUR BRONZE!!!! SHOW OFF YOUR ICON!!!

JOOOIN UUUS, DEEEP TEEERRROR.

\*very loud zombie noises\*

(P.S. if you don't get it, I'm silver.)

Upvoted for your name.

Also for being silver.
That's when you type "Diamond" and see if it listens
ðŸ˜­
Bad Omen? Naw that means your gonna be silver. That's a good omen.

At least it doesn't read "wood" --- THAT is a bad omen.
 
And believe me when I say "wood" shows up more often on street signs than "silver".

I have a high elo friend (Master-Challenger Tier) who frequently smurfs with me in normals. When I asked why he smurfs with me a lot, he said:

"The queues are 50 minutes long and you can never make mistakes in a game. If you DO make one, people will punish you hard for it.

Here, its chill. Most of the time, no one cares if you mess up. Feeding one kill early doesn't matter as much. You lose less hair ETC."

Not an exact quote (much more swearing), but thats the gist of what he said. Honestly, my goal is Gold 5 next season just for the rewards.

It's not so bad, i got up to 95 lp five times before my teams randomly fed and afk'd until i got down to 12 and then i climbed back to 90.  I even got into my promos once and lost one game because every lane fed and the other our support Nautilus was on the phone with his friend who wasn't even in the game  the entire time.

 IT'S NOT SO BAD

*SOBS*
Mine said "Scrub" {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
I wish I could make it to silver. Lol
pls kill me
